• Announcement
  • Featured Guest

The 19th Biennial Festival of New Music will take place January 31 – February 2 on the campus of the Florida State University’s College of Music. Composers are invited to submit one composition for consideration. Preference will be given to recent works. Student compositions are encouraged. Works for all solo instruments, chamber ensembles, voice, choir, orchestra, wind ensemble, and electroacoustic submissions will be considered. Deadline is April 30, 2018.

  • Call for Scores
  •      
  • Submission

The festival will also feature presentations, works, performances, and masterclasses by our special guest, composer Georg Friedrich Haas.
